name: Don't Get Fired (ColbyHman)
description:
It's your first day on the job, and after your orientation you find out that the company plans to fire all under-performing employees. You must show your worth and work your way to keeping your job. However, while going through your day, you learn of some suspicious activity within the upper ranks of the company...

This is my first game in Unity. I've been learning game development throughout this game jam and this is the first full game I have completed. There were some items I wish I was able to include in this release, but work and personal life took up a lot of the 10 days. If this rates well, I might continue to polish this game
